snippet.title: Batman & Robin Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
Batman & Robin Trailer 1998

Official Content From Acclaim

POW! POOF! BLAM! Become Caped Crusader, Robin or Batgirl and fight the likes of Mr. Freeze or Poison Ivy. Take a drive in the Batmobile along with other vehicles from the movie. Then retire to the Batcave & decipher some of the clues you picked up in Gotham City!
Platforms: Sony PlayStation

Sony PlayStation
, Action,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Batman & Robin
